111.content:
Peter had always been more or less “Average” He would score decently on tests and homework but never near the top of the class. He would always been in shape but never near the size he wanted to be. He would drive a average car rather then anything fancy despite his desires otherwise, he would work a dead end job at the gas station rather then go to college. In short his life had just been a series of him having to accept mediocre and he would not do so any longer!

He awoke groggily from his bed in his two room apartment as the alarm clock went off signaling it was his time to work today. He shoved off his bed and scratched absently at his fur before glancing downward, his boxers were not empty but they were not straining either…Just another example of how he had to settle for the “average” and not good. He glanced at himself in the mirror he kept in the corner of his room and his term average applied perfectly. He stood at six foot even, he weighed about one hundred and thirty pounds and despite him being fairly in shape you could tell he was aging. He was only twenty two and already his “average” body was beginning to show signs of age. He sighed as he dressed for his job as cashier over at the local fill and stop.

He walked out of his house a few minutes later, a piece of toast hanging between his muzzle as he began to eat as he walked out of his apartment locking it up as he left. Just then he…
111.title: The average story of peter

1122221.content:
Apple looked both left and right. The narrow door that led from his kitchen into the alley between his tall, thin house and the home next door was empty. Only the ever-present, flaking stucco -plastered to the asphalt by last night's rain- was there. He'd moved his scooter into the shed in the high-walled back yard after Mrs. Galliston's bike had gotten stolen the previous week.

He stepped out, box under his arm, and after locking the way into his house, went back to the wrought-iron gate at the rear of the alley. Unlocking it, he went through into his little sanctuary in the center of the city.

High, red-brick walls surrounded his yard. His sharp nose reveled in the scents of early spring: fiddleheads coming up along the north wall and the tiniest of buds starting to emerge on the rose bushes. He walked back to the tool shed he kept and unlocked it with a glance around. No one in the neighboring houses was looking at him.

He went inside.

Turning on the single, bare bulb, he unwrapped the package.

The young, college-bound fox stared in excitement.

The bottle of pills that he'd bribed that teacher's assistant from the bio lab had come through. He wasn't the only fox in the bio department but he was the only one who'd had his particular, little "problem". The big wolf he'd had to suck off to get the sexual enhancement drugs they were developing had been worth it. He'd also shown the results of probably having taken the drugs, himself. The wolf had been hung like a Clydesdale.

Apple's jaw still ached, three days later.

Now, it was his turn.

He stripped, his red fur glistening in the dim light, and looked at his reflection in the full-length mirror.

Apple stood about five-foot-six and was hung comparatively. Sure, he'd heard that gay and bi guys were bigger than straight, on average, but that was probably an urban myth. After all, he wasn't. He was only about five inches long when fully hard.

That had to change. It was hard enough picking up a date when he went out without the guy laughing at his size.

Deftly, he popped open the pill bottle and took one of the pink pills.

He waited...
1122221.title: Meet Apple

He waited.

112222121122.content:
It was tempting, in his frustration, to just gulp down the full bottle of pills. But even if they were just placebos...

He didn't want to risk it.

Annoyed, though, he poured out a handful of 10 pills and gulped them down. Thirteen, total. His "lucky" number.

Apple looked down at his groin and sighed. Nothing.

Pocketing the remaining thirty-or-so pills he pulled on his shorts and decided to go have a few words with Marcus, the hung wolf who'd given him the pills.

Once dressed, he left his small shed and retrieved his scooter for a late-evening trip to campus.

Arriving at the Biology Building, he parked his ride, locked it up, and went inside, his long, red tail swishing -annoyed- behind him.

Climbing the stairs to the third floor, he headed to the Teacher Assistant's lounge, looking for Marcus. Just as he put his paw on the door, however, the fox felt something odd. A tingling began to grow in the base of his abdomen and spread, warmly, down into his balls and average-sized cock.

He blinked and looked down. Getting a bit stiff at the erotic sensation, his pants were tented behind his button-fly shorts making his zipper stand out a bit more. But it looked different.

It looked bigger.

He gulped.

A single pill was supposed to make him bigger over a period of a day or two but he'd taken ... how many? How would so many effect him; would they even work as intended?

He gulped nervously.

Just then, the handle of the door pulled out of his paw and the big, muscular wolf, Marcus walked out of the lounge.

"Apple?" he asked, confused. "What are you doing here?"
112222121122.title: Thirteen:  A Lucky Number

choices: Marcus is all-business and investigates the problem.
Marcus is totally aroused and forces Apple to submit to some non-clinical "fun".
1122221211221.content:
Apple looked at Marcus nervously. The huge wolf towered in the door frame of the lounge used by the Teaching Assistants. Did he look even taller than last week when they’d last met? Maybe those pills worked on wolves—not foxes like himself—and they were making Marcus’ whole body bigger over time! He shook his head, embarrassed by his frustrated arrive and the tingling in his groin.

“I asked what’re you doing here?” the wolf repeated. “You paid me already and,” he lowered his voice, “I don’t need anyone connecting the pill theft with you and me!”

His cock tingled more as did his balls. He could feel his flesh shifting and changing size. What had he done to himself?

info.description:
My second story is about male anthro's and furries expanding

Anything could happen here!

Just basic rules!

Keep it about male anthro's growing

It could be any sort of growth, Macro, Expansion, Muscle expasion, Weight gain, Gential, Whatever you want!

Just keep it interesting, Keep it hot and Add!

Will give gift points for good additions!
